title: Module not found: Can't resolve in React
causes: Component name does not match case-sensitive file name.
solutions: Check the file path and ensure correct casing.
Make sure the file extension is included.

title: React Hook useState is not defined
causes: The 'useState' function is not imported from React.
solutions: Import React and useState at the top of the file: `import React, { useState } from 'react';`
Ensure React is installed correctly using `npx expo install react`.
